messages.subject: TV voluntarily off
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/5/2003 11:32:25 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Mark does too. He isn t a writer, but because he is good with patterns, he can edit stuff
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/5/2003 11:32:25 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> Keith says he always saw patterns in the world, in everything.
> Holly does too.

Mark does too.
He isn't a writer, but because he is good with patterns, he can edit stuff
for me. He can't tell me what is wrong with a sentence, but he can quickly
"feel" that it isn't right. It's amazing the way he sees patterns, even in words.

Those really difficult puzzles, he figures out in no time. I bought him one
that was supposed to take really talented people at least 2 hours....he did it
in less than 5 minutes! What a waste of money.

Ren


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
